info.name: AI Question Generator API
info.description: Collection for testing the AI Question Generator API

body.raw:
{
  "question_text": "What is Newton's First Law of Motion?",
  "question_type": "MCQ",
  "options": [
    "An object at rest stays at rest unless acted upon by an external force",
    "Force equals mass times acceleration",
    "For every action there is an equal and opposite reaction",
    "Energy cannot be created or destroyed"
  ],
  "correct_answer": "An object at rest stays at rest unless acted upon by an external force",
  "explanation": "Newton's First Law of Motion states that an object will remain at rest or in uniform motion in a straight line unless acted upon by an external force.",
  "difficulty": "Medium",
  "topic_id": "{{topic_id}}"
}
